description:
Hideyoshi wants to put a new piece of art on a lonely looking wall in the palace with Nobunaga as the obvious subject. He comes up with a plan to distract Nobunaga with the assistance of Sasuke, Ieyasu and Ishida Mitsunari. Ieyasu and Mitsunari are supposed to do the distracting while Hideyoshi does the drawing, but nothing quite goes as planned.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イケメン秘密のスケッチ
